## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.log or debug statements

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested all edge cases

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGES.md file (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments for new functions/methods
- [ ] README is updated (if needed)

### Security
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords, etc.) is included
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where needed
- [ ] No SQL injection or XSS vulnerabilities introduced

### Dependencies
- [ ] No new dependencies added, OR
- [ ] New dependencies are necessary and have been reviewed for security
- [ ] `npm audit` shows no new vulnerabilities
